poputils 0.1.1
  • Get started
  • Reference

    Function reference

    All functions

    age_group_type()
    Infer type of age labels
    age_labels()
    Create age labels
    age_lower() age_mid() age_upper()
    Lower limits, midpoints, and upper limits of age groups
    check_age()
    Validity checks for age labels
    check_equal_length()
    Check that 'x' and 'y' arguments have the same length
    check_no_overlap_colnums()
    Check that column vectors do not overlap
    combine_age()
    Aggregate age group labels
    ex_to_lifetab_brass()
    Derive Life Tables that Match Life Expectancies, using a Brass Logit Model
    find_label_female()
    Identify female sex or gender labels
    find_label_male()
    Identify male sex or gender labels
    find_var_age()
    Identify an age variable
    find_var_sexgender()
    Identify a sex or gender variable
    find_var_time()
    Identify a time variable
    groups_colnums()
    Get a named vector of column indices for the grouping variables in a grouped data frame
    lifetab() lifeexp()
    HAS_TESTS Calculate life tables or life expectancies
    logit() invlogit()
    Logit and Inverse-Logit Function
    matrix_to_list_of_cols() matrix_to_list_of_rows()
    Turn a matrix into a list of columns or rows
    nzmort
    Mortality data and rates for New Zealand
    nzmort_rvec
    Mortality data and probabilistic rates for New Zealand
    reformat_age()
    Reformat age group labels
    reformat_sex()
    Reformat a binary sex variable
    set_age_open()
    Set the open age group
    to_matrix()
    Build a matrix from measure and ID variables
    west_lifetab
    Coale-Demeny "West" model life tables

    Developed by John Bryant.
